name: Lacey

topics.response_text: {Bad person just walked in}Got some nerve, coming to an NCR outpost with that look about you.{Low, warning}Hope you aren't here to trade, not sure you can afford the prices.

topics.topic_text: What do you have for trade?
I was hoping to pass the time with a game or two.
topics.response_text: What, Caravan? All right, I'll give it a go.{Shrugs}Haven't exactly got much of a line of folks to serve.
All right, go on - let's put our cards down.

topics.topic_text: Anything you can tell me about the Outpost?
topics.response_text: {Shrugs}Not too much, lot of caravans going nowhere.{Beat}Lot of troopers going nowhere, too.
{Dismissive}Work around here? Might check with Jackson in the main building. Or Ghost up on the roof above, but watch out, she's... well, she's kind of a bitch.

topics.topic_text: Never mind, I'll be going now.

description:
Lacey is a 32 year-old Human Female.

A human merchant who makes her living as a standing trader at the New California Republic's Mojave Outpost. She is known for her fair prices and extensive knowledge of the Mojave Wasteland.

Lacey's Personality: Lacey is pragmatic and observant, with a sharp wit and a keen eye for valuable goods. She maintains a professional demeanor with customers but can be quite talkative when discussing local rumors and potential trading opportunities.

Lacey's Backstory: Born and raised in a small NCR settlement in California, Lacey learned the art of trading from her parents at a young age. After the death of her family during a raider attack, she made her way east to the Mojave Wasteland, seeking new opportunities. She has been working at the Mojave Outpost for the past five years, establishing herself as a reliable source of supplies and information for NCR Rangers and travelers alike.
